item.title: Cephadm
item.description: CEPHADM cephadm is a new function introduced in Ceph Octopus 15. It allows for an easier method to install and manage Ceph nodes. Traditional Ceph commands On ncn-s001, ncn-s002, or ncn-s003: ncn-s# cephadm shell The previous command creates a container and opens an interactive shell with access to run Ceph commands the traditional way. Or optionally, you can execute your command as follos: ncn-s# cephadm shell -- ceph -s Ceph Device Operations There are multiple ways to do Ceph device operations now.
